amendment.description: To provide for a report on the availability and affordability of products developed with public funding.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1618 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1618 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11297; text: CR S11297) To provide for a report on the availability and affordability of products developed with public funding.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1618 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1618 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 1542.
